meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting a line on a map connecting points having the same temperature at a given time.
meanings.sent1: The isotheral map showed areas with similar temperatures.
meanings.sent2: The desert has an isotheral climate throughout the year.
meanings.sent3: The isotheral line threw a party for all the points on the map.
meanings.sent4: Her mood was isotheral, never fluctuating like the weather.
meanings.sent5: The isotheral concept made understanding weather patterns easier for the students.
